__e: POOR DADDY LYING SICK IN THE NEXT ROOM,
That poor other guy, he didn't get to hear the good news.
Heaven help the man that takes up with you for life.
The poor thing shouldn't have to live.
He said that the first gift was lifeless, so it didn't say anything, but this gift is full of life, and if you refuse to accept it then the poor thing will not be able to bear it.
One day you'll be shouting, "Come in," and it'll go on forever cos the poor sod won't be able to get in and you won't be able to get out.

They're probably from some poor devil... who was madly in love with her, nearly perished when she married me... and once a year, on the anniversary of their last farewell... sends her this little bunch of snapdragons.
A poor little fellow that never meant nobody no harm. Sitting with the angel of death, and you cracking jokes.
That's something you do to some poor schnook who won't hit back.
Can't you see the poor thing's in pain?
Poor bastard will be lucky if he remembers his name after the beating he got.

Some poor guy comes along, his car breaks down, he sees the light shining in our window, so he comes upstairs and asks us if he can please use our phone, and right away you think something wrong is happening.
Go on with your story, sir.
It's the same idea you poor dad had and mine as well.
I thought I would have to walk- dear me!
